name: The Docker Swarm story with Andrea Luzzardi, former Docker Swarm Lead (Ship It! #47)
summary: This episode was requested by Tyler Smith who feels that he may not need Kubernetes just yet. Tyler has a few questions about Docker &amp; Docker Swarm, so Andrea Luzzardi, former Docker Swarm Lead, joins us today to answer them. We talk about Docker Swarm beginnings, some of the challenges that it faced, and what Andr...
